posts.postText: I think as a Traitor you should be able to open the credits shop and buy a grenade launcher it should have instant kill but only 1 bullet just imagine you a traitor with a grenade launcher and 5 people just sitting around a body and you shoot you would get 5 points it would be so epic i think they should add that. :)
Just because of MW2 I have to say no to this.
OP again... Would get more whining than anything..
